metadata.synopsis: A beautiful young woman (Juliette Marquis) cares for her ailing father (James Woods) and goes on a blind date while working as a porn star.

reviews: [Juliette Marquis] is the only reason to keep watching-a green-eyed Ukrainian... who swims with equal ease through water, air, clothes, furniture, and the holes in both the script and the head of her writer-director, Ash.
[Star Juliette Marquis delivers a] brave, eye-opening performance.
he doesn't have much story to tell, and he knows it, but damn if he isn't going to go down without a fight.
An imperfect movie with so many moments of truth that you forgive its stumbles.
O pobre diretor e roteirista Ash acaba sendo vtima da prpria falta de talento - o que, infelizmente, tambm nos transforma em vtimas.
Ultimately left me feeling very unfulfilled in terms of its plot and its obvious 'message'.

This Girl's Life was a standout at the CineVegas Film Festival; the best of the lot. James Woods is in great form as usual and if Juliette Marquis is not a star within the next five years, then you can judge me all you want.
